title: Can't Install League?
body: I got a new computer (MSI gaming laptop) and it came with Windows 10, and I'm trying to install League onto this computer but every time it gets to be around 19-20% installed, a pop-up occurs and says that an "unspecified error has occurred" and the only option given is to retry the installation process. I tried to install it three times already and the same issue occurs. Any advice would be helpful, thank you!

replies.body: I managed to get it installed, thank you so much!!

An unspecified error at that point in the process may suggest a security setting blocking your PC from scanning game files.  Check out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up!  Grats on your gaming rig!
